comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Secretary of the Treasury, William Gibbs McAdoo married the President's daughter while serving in Wilson's cabinet. Wow! en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Gibbs_McAdoo

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content:
Harry Angstrom:

Thanks for the tip! We'll add his full name to the source data and then reload the description to Flickr.

comment.author: 8521690@N02
comment._content: Thank you for adding this interesting image to the Historical Desks group, much appreciated. There is a bit of a local connection here as Secretary McAdoo's boss and Father-in-Law, Woodrow Wilson visited Carlisle in Cumbria UK where his mother was born. The house of her birth still exits in Warwick Street and sports a blue plaque which can be seen at: www.flickr.com/search/groups/?q=woodrow%20wilson&w=10...

comment.author: 51918342@N02
comment._content: Interestingly, Vincent Price portrayed him in the movie "Wilson."
